title: The economic injustice of plastic
description: When we throw away our plastic trash, where does it go? In this hard-hitting talk, Van Jones shows us how our throwaway culture hits poor people and poor countries "first and worst," with consequences we all share no matter where we live. He offers some ways to reclaim our planet from plastic garbage.
author: Van Jones
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, business, communication, global issues, green, inequality, plastic, poverty, science, Anthropocene
